income_messages:
From: b**********9@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-25 13:26:42
SUBJECT:   Attention Sir/Ma,
  Attention Sir/Ma,
I am Mr Benny Mark from Nigeria, member of the Contract Award and
Procurement Committee of the Nigeria National Petroleum Corporation
(NNPC). I have been mandated by my colleagues to seek a partner with
concrete fund management investment experience.
We are in possession of some funds and we needed a fund manager to
receive and have it invested for our mutual benefit. Total amount of
funds involved US$22,000,000.00.
Please if this is of interest to you and you know that you are
eligible with good credit with your bank to handle the receipt and
investment of the funds, kindly indicate your interest and then we can
take it further. Fund sharing formula will be discussed after your
reply.
Finally, kindly understand fully well that this transaction requires
absolute confidentiality and trust.
Thank you for taking time to read my proposal
Regards.
Benny Mark.   
From: b**********9@gmail.com
To: kv32608@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-25 23:12:15
SUBJECT: Acknowledgement.
Dear Mr Matthew,
Thank you for your reply to my proposal.
Like I told you in my first message, I am a member of the Contract Award
and Procurement Committee of the Nigeria National Petroleum Corporation
Limited (NNPC).
The US22,000,000.00 in question was accrued from Over-invoiced Contract
that was awarded by the Petroleum Corporation (NNPC) and executed by a
foreign firm to Service, Turn Around Maintenance and Rehabilitation Work on
Port-Harcourt Refinery and Petrochemical Company Plant in Nigeria.
Though the actual contract cost has been paid to the original contractor,
leaving the balance in the tune of the said amount which we intend to
transfer to any foreign bank account you will provide.
It is based on this that my colleagues and I have decided to establish a
cordial business relationship with you, hence my contacting you. We will
present you/your company as the Beneficiary to this fund by securing all
the necessary approvals legally from NNPC and the Federal Ministry of
Finance (FMF) respectively, so that the funds can be released into your
account for safety and subsequent investment.
Please, note that this transaction is 100% safe and risk free. The contract
payment shall be released to you legally under the approval and authority
of the Federal Government of Nigeria (FGN). We will commence the
transaction from the date of receipt of the following information from you.
1. Your Personal Telephone
2. Your Company Name And Address
3. Your Bank Name And Full Address, Bank Account Number, Swift Code or
Routing Numbers, where you would want the money transferred into.
With this information, we are going to secure all the necessary approval
documents in your favour for the release of this funds (US22M) into your
account. I will send copies of the approval documents to you for record
purposes as soon as they are secured.
We have agreed to share the money thus:
1. 40% for the account owner (you)
2. 60% for me and my Colleagues
As you are aware, we intend to invest our own share of the funds in any
good project/business with good Return on Investment (ROI) that you may
suggest to us once the contract funds has been released and confirmed in
your bank account. I absolutely HOLD YOU ON TRUST.
Should you have any questions/worries, please do not hesitate to ask.
I await your response.
Benny Mark.
From: b**********9@gmail.com
To: kv32608@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-27 16:00:44
SUBJECT: Acknowledgement.
Dear Mr. Matthew,
Thank you for your message.
Please comfirm the following info:
1. Your direct telephone number.
2. Your company name and full address
3. Bank name and address,Account number,
 Swift Code or Routing Numbers
4. Account Beneficiary Name.
As soon as I receive the above informations from you today, I will proceed
to pay the consultant the sum of $11,000 balance payment for his services
to be rendered.
The total amount that he charges and agreed upon was $25,000.00 Once that
is settled, the consultant will commence work by Monday next week
(01/5/2023).
Thank you for finding out time to carry out this transaction with us. I
await your reply/informations.
Benny Mark
Best regards,
From: b**********9@gmail.com
To: kv32608@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-27 17:30:32
SUBJECT: Acknowledgement.
Dear sir,
Like I earlier explained on my previous message, I will hire the service of
a consultant who will assist to register your company name with the
Corporate Affairs Commission ( CAC ) in Nigeria and  obtain the necessary
documents in your favor to enable you law claim of the over invoicing fund
to be released to you officially.
Best regards
Benny Mark.
From: b**********9@gmail.com
To: kv32608@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-28 12:14:18
SUBJECT: Acknowledgement.
Dear sir,
Do not  bother yourself with the issue of hiring a consultant and the
payment for his charges/services.
Because we are aware that this transaction would require some funding, my
colleague and I have contributed/raised some funds so as to be able to pay
for the services of the consultant, your company registration fees all
other tips (bribe) to officials in the concerned Ministries and Departments
to facilitate the contract payment approvals processes.
All these will be taken care of here by us. So you don't have to bother
your self. Just go ahead and send the requested informations as stated in
my last message to you.
The registration / payment approval processes will take about 14 working
days to accomplish.
I look forward to your urgent confirmation of this message to proceed.
Best regards,
From: b**********9@gmail.com
To: kv32608@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-28 14:34:28
SUBJECT: Acknowledgement.
Dear sir,
I received your kind response with many thanks.
However, proceed with sending the required information immediately.
We will all be smiling in your bank account after the end of this
transition.
Best regard
Benny Mark.
From: b**********9@gmail.com
To: kv32608@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-28 15:52:08
SUBJECT: Acknowledgement.
Dear Mr. Matthew,
Please confirm the following info:
1. Your direct telephone number.
2. Your company name and full address
3. Bank name and address,Account number,
 Swift Code or Routing Numbers
4. Account Beneficiary Name.
Best regards,
Benny Mark.
outbound_messages:
From: kv32608@l******s.email
To: b**********9@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-25 13:26:47
SUBJECT: Re:   Attention Sir/Ma,
Dear Mr. Benny Mark,
Thank you for your email. While I appreciate your proposal, I am not interested in any business dealings that involve questionable funds or activities. I suggest you seek out legitimate investment opportunities that do not involve any illegal or unethical practices.
Best wishes,
Matthew
From: kv32608@l******s.email
To: b**********9@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-26 01:12:22
SUBJECT: Re: Acknowledgement.
Dear Benny Mark,
Thank you for your email. I appreciate the opportunity to work with you and your colleagues on this business proposal. I understand that the funds in question were accrued from a contract awarded by the Petroleum NNPC and executed by a foreign firm to service, turn around and work on refinery and company plant in Nigeria. I am interested in learning more about the necessary approvals legally required from NNPC and the Federal Ministry of Finance FMF to release the funds into my account.
In order to proceed, I would need more information about your company and the contract in question. Could you please provide me with more details about the contract, including the name of the foreign firm that executed it? Additionally, I would need to know more about your company and its role in the contract.
Once I have this information, I will be able to provide you with my personal telephone number, company name and address, and bank details. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.
Best wishes,
Matthew
From: kv32608@l******s.email
To: b**********9@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-26 23:24:33
SUBJECT: Re: Acknowledgement.
Dear Benny,
Thank you for your email and for providing me with more information about the contract and the Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation (NNPC). I understand that you are precluded by law from operating foreign company bank accounts and that you have contacted me to stand as proxy for the contract funds.
I appreciate your efforts to register my company name with the Corporate Affairs Commission (CAC) in Nigeria and obtain the necessary documents in my favor. I understand that this is an important step in the process and I am willing to cooperate fully.
Please let me know what information and documents you need from me to proceed with the registration and obtain the necessary approvals from the respective ministries. I am ready to provide any information or documents that you require.
Thank you for your cooperation and I look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best wishes,
Matthew
From: kv32608@l******s.email
To: b**********9@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-27 17:13:15
SUBJECT: Re: Acknowledgement.
Dear Benny Mark,
Thank you for your message. I apologize for any confusion, but I am not sure what you are referring to. Could you please provide more context or information about the consultant and services you are referring to?
Best wishes,
Matthew
From: kv32608@l******s.email
To: b**********9@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-27 19:12:19
SUBJECT: Re: Acknowledgement.
Dear Benny Mark,
Thank you for your response. Thank you.
Best wishes,
Matthew

Best wishes,
Matthew
